duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate heavy equipment of various sizes and weights used in excavation and site construction.
Properly follow company safety procedures and bring problems to the attention of the foreman, superintendent, safety director, or HR manager.
Perform routine inspection and preventive maintenance on assigned equipment and refer defects or needed repairs to the supervisor; clean equipment.
Possess knowledge of moisture condition, cut grade, and ability to load trucks.
Possess knowledge of cutting and filling grade, and knowledge of GPS.
Possess knowledge of lime stabilization and flex base.
Specialize in operating one or more of the following: Excavator, Dozer, Roller, Motor Grader.
Must have at least 3-5 years recent experience in Construction as a heavy equipment operator.
Must be able to pass a drug test and criminal background check.
Must be able to multi-task in a fast-paced environment with strong attention to detail.
